titleStmt.title: A very true pronosticacio[n], with a kalender, gathered out of the moost auncyent bokes of ryght holy astronomers for the yere of our lorde M. CCCCC. xxxvj. And for all yeres here after perpetuall. Translated out of latyn in to Englysshe by Iohn Ryckes preest. Cum priuilegio Regali.
titleStmt.author: Brunfels, Otto, 1488-1534.
Ryckes, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete, at the sygne of the sonne by me Ioh[a]n Byddell,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; printer's name at foot of title page [Ioh[a]n Byddell]; publication date from STC.
Caption title on leaf D8r reads: Plinius in the .xviij. booke and .xxxiij. chapyter of his naturall hystory.
Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
